author: Fextralife
description:
Elden Ring Nightreign - WHERE Is the DLC??
In this Elden Ring Nightreign video, we're going to talk a little bit about the Deep of Night, we're going to talk a little bit about the fact that there are less than 30,000 players on steam right now for the first time ever for Nightreign, and we're going to talk about where the DLC that was promised before the end of the year for Nightreign.

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki

Timestamp:
0:00 Elden Ring Nightreign 
1:03 Deep of Night
2:20 Relics RNG
2:59 Nightreign Progression or lack thereof
4:20 Nightreign Steam Player Base
5:50 Nightreign DLC
7:48 DLC Content
8:50 Map
9:36 Weapons
10:21 TLDR
